name: tessl-labs/intent-integrity-kit
summary: Closing the intent-to-code chasm - specification-driven development with BDD verification chain
description:
Intent Integrity Kit (IIKit) preserves your intent from idea to implementation through specification-driven development with BDD verification chain. Compatible with Claude Code, Codex, Gemini, and OpenCode.

What's new in v2.5.0: Clarify is now a generic utility (/iikit-clarify) that can run after any phase on any artifact — spec, plan, checklist, testify, tasks, or constitution. All downstream skills renumbered (02-plan through 08-taskstoissues). Dashboard shows ?N clarification count badges on pipeline nodes.

v2.0.0: BREAKING — testify generates Gherkin .feature files (replaces test-specs.md). Full BDD verification chain: hash integrity, step coverage, step quality, framework scaffolding. Static dashboard. Analyze skill .feature tag traceability. Implement skill enforces red-green-verify cycle.
